```{r}
library(data.table)

# HiCHIP
# k4me3

loops_k4me3 = fread("largedata/S3b_K4me3_HiChIP.txt",header = T, data.table = F)

s1_mads = which((loops_k4me3$Chr == 3) & (loops_k4me3$s1 >= 150000000) & (loops_k4me3$s1 <= 180000000))
e1_mads = which((loops_k4me3$Chr == 3) & (loops_k4me3$e1 >= 150000000) & (loops_k4me3$e1 <= 180000000))
s2_mads = which((loops_k4me3$Chr == 3) & (loops_k4me3$s2 >= 150000000) & (loops_k4me3$s2 <= 180000000))
e2_mads = which((loops_k4me3$Chr == 3) & (loops_k4me3$e2 >= 150000000) & (loops_k4me3$e2 <= 180000000))

id_mads_s = sort(unique(c(s1_mads, e1_mads, s2_mads, e2_mads)))
loops_k4me3 = loops_k4me3[id_mads_s,]
rownames(loops_k4me3) = 1:nrow(loops_k4me3)

#iSNPs

# isnps of days to silk 
isnps_k4me3_ds = fread("largedata/mediation_paper_revision/DaystoSilk_indirect_mediateR_top100.csv", header = T, data.table = F)
isnps_k4me3_ds$chr = as.integer(gsub("X|\\..*", "", isnps_k4me3_ds$location))
isnps_k4me3_ds$pos = as.integer(gsub("X[0-9]*\\.","", isnps_k4me3_ds$location))

# isnps of GDD to silk 
isnps_k4me3_gdds = fread("largedata/mediation_paper_revision/GDDDaystoSilk_indirect_mediateR_top100.csv", header = T, data.table = F)
isnps_k4me3_gdds$chr = as.integer(gsub("X|\\..*", "", isnps_k4me3_gdds$location))
isnps_k4me3_gdds$pos = as.integer(gsub("X[0-9]*\\.","", isnps_k4me3_gdds$location))


# isnps of days to tassel 
isnps_k4me3_dt = fread("largedata/mediation_paper_revision/DaysToTassel_indirect_mediateR_top100.csv", header = T, data.table = F)
isnps_k4me3_dt$chr = as.integer(gsub("X|\\..*", "", isnps_k4me3_dt$location))
isnps_k4me3_dt$pos = as.integer(gsub("X[0-9]*\\.","", isnps_k4me3_dt$location))

# isnps of GDD to tassel 
isnps_k4me3_gddt = fread("largedata/mediation_paper_revision/GDDDaystoTassel_indirect_mediateR_top100.csv", header = T, data.table = F)
isnps_k4me3_gddt$chr = as.integer(gsub("X|\\..*", "", isnps_k4me3_gddt$location))
isnps_k4me3_gddt$pos = as.integer(gsub("X[0-9]*\\.","", isnps_k4me3_gddt$location))


library("GenomicRanges")
library("plyr")
# 0 overlap of isnps of days to silk with loops of k4me3

o_isnps_hic <- function(isnps, loops) {
  grc <- with(isnps, GRanges(seqnames=chr, IRanges(start=pos, end=pos)))

  grf1 <- with(loops, GRanges(seqnames=Chr, IRanges(start=s1, end=e1)))
  
  ### find overlaps between the two
  tb1 <- findOverlaps(query=grf1, subject=grc)
  tb1 <- as.matrix(tb1)

  overlap1 = cbind(isnps[tb1[,2],], loops[tb1[,1],])


  grf2 <- with(loops, GRanges(seqnames=Chr, IRanges(start=s2, end=e2)))

  ### find overlaps between the two
  tb2 <- findOverlaps(query=grf2, subject=grc)
  tb2 <- as.matrix(tb2)

  overlap2 = cbind(isnps[tb2[,2],], loops[tb2[,1],])

  overlapc = rbind(overlap1, overlap2)
  return(overlapc)

}

o_isnps_loops_k4me3_gddt = o_isnps_hic(isnps_k4me3_gddt, loops_k4me3)

o_isnps_loops_k4me3_gdds = o_isnps_hic(isnps_k4me3_gdds, loops_k4me3)

o_isnps_loops_k4me3_dt = o_isnps_hic(isnps_k4me3_dt, loops_k4me3)

o_isnps_loops_k4me3_ds = o_isnps_hic(isnps_k4me3_ds, loops_k4me3)


# the overlaps are the same across dt gddt gdds
fwrite(o_isnps_loops_k4me3_gdds, "largedata/mediation_paper_revision/o_top_new_isnps_loops_k4me3_gdds.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F)
fwrite(o_isnps_loops_k4me3_gddt, "largedata/mediation_paper_revision/o_top_new_isnps_loops_k4me3_gddt.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F)
fwrite(o_isnps_loops_k4me3_ds, "largedata/mediation_paper_revision/o_top_new_isnps_loops_k4me3_ds.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F)
fwrite(o_isnps_loops_k4me3_dt, "largedata/mediation_paper_revision/o_top_new_isnps_loops_k4me3_dt.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F)


```

gene_coordinate = fread("largedata/gene_coordinate.txt", header = T, data.table = F)
gene_coordinate = gene_coordinate[which(gene_coordinate$chromosome_name == "3"),]
gene_coordinate$chromosome_name = as.integer(gene_coordinate$chromosome_name)

o_med_isnps_hic = function(gene_coordinate, o_isnps_loops){
  grc <- with(gene_coordinate, GRanges(seqnames=chromosome_name, IRanges(start=start_position, end=end_position)))

  grf1 <- with(o_isnps_loops, GRanges(seqnames=Chr, IRanges(start=s1, end=e1)))

  ### find overlaps between the two
  tb1 <- findOverlaps(query=grf1, subject=grc)
  tb1 <- as.matrix(tb1)

  overlap1 = cbind(gene_coordinate[tb1[,2],], o_isnps_loops[tb1[,1],])


  grf2 <- with(o_isnps_loops, GRanges(seqnames=Chr, IRanges(start=s2, end=e2)))

  ### find overlaps between the two
  tb2 <- findOverlaps(query=grf2, subject=grc)
  tb2 <- as.matrix(tb2)

  overlap2 = cbind(gene_coordinate[tb2[,2],], o_isnps_loops[tb2[,1],])

  overlapc = rbind(overlap1, overlap2)
  
  return(overlapc)

}

o_med_isnps_hic_k4me3_gdds = o_med_isnps_hic(gene_coordinate, o_isnps_loops_k4me3_gdds)

fwrite(o_med_isnps_hic_k4me3_ds, "largedata/mediation_paper_revision/o_med_top_new_isnps_hic_k4me3_ds.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F) #3
